metaTitle: ICC T20 World Cup schedule | ICC World Cup betting | Bilbet bookmaker
description: Place your bets on the hottest ICC T20 World Cup matches. Join Bilbet and get 500 INR on your first deposit!
title2: Choose your BONUS and win with us!
firstDeposit: to the first replenishment from 300 INR
rulesTextCasino:
Welcome to the world of great opportunities! We have a special bonus for you that will brighten your start.

When you make the first deposit in the amount of ₹300/৳400 or more, you'll get 125% of bonuses to your bonus account*. Remember, the larger the amount of your first deposit, the more bonuses you'll get! You''ll need to confirm your email or phone number.

In order to master these bonuses and turn them into real money, you'll need to fulfill only one condition: to place bets in the amount of 50 times more than the amount of your bonus. And what's most interesting, you can make a wager both in our casino and at sports events - the choice is yours!

And finally, after successful completion of the wager, your money from the bonus account will be transferred to your live account, where you can enjoy it and use it at your discretion.

But that's not all, after successful wagering and getting money to your live account, you’ll get 25 free spins.

Funds received from free spins will also need to be wagered by making bets in the amount of 20 times more than the total amount won from the gift free spins.

Don't miss this chance to change your luck for the better. Welcome to us! Remember that the site administration reserves the right to change any clause of the rules without notifying participants.

*no more than ₹20000/৳20000 to the bonus account.
